Articles.Content:
7 hours ago, Glitchgamer12 said:

Do what....

Shows you Future? Like "will i win in next lottery? Yes/not"
The power to do awful impressions of memes
The power that, whenever you blink, a 1cm3 volume of air located at 34.701342"N, 170.920260"E heats up by 1 degree celsius.

So, that's what this is about!..
Every time when I measure the air temperature at 34.701342"N, 170.920260"E with a standard 1cm3 volume thermometer, it heats up by 1 degree celsius.
Probably, somebody superpowered blinks at the same moment!..

Edited September 11, 2017 by kerbiloid

the super useless power to:

"the less you interact with other beings of your kind, the less you interact with them, and anway every attempt to interacting more or less with them doesn't change much how you feel about your super useless superpower, still it seem you tend to interacting more less & less more with them"

i came up with another idea:

the super useless super power to be a large range of "n"tmf wavelenght (n bein a natural integar) coming either from deep deep space either, the sun, a planet, or more earth locally emitted , and , as such a wavelenght you could at more or less random depending some other factor be very annoyin or either totally not for a various range of lifeform on earth but not all and not all the time and not always and not necessarilly with the same intensity at the same time

Edited September 28, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''
The power to automatically transform into a glowing blue goat whenever you see another glowing blue goat.
The power to be stalked.
The power to eat pant.
the power to convince someone im not stalking them
The power to not listen.
The power to have any wish granted, but only when your wishes are being granted.
The power to ruin any meme in sight.
The power to grow uncontrollably, but only during growth spurts.
The power to become grass, but only in a pasture....
A power to orbit working on deorbit.
The power to foresee the next song on a playlist set to random.
The power to necro an old thread that has been dormant for years.
The power to add a comment to any thread that has been resurrected.

The power to undie a mummy thread written in Egyptian hieroglyphs and continue the conversation together with those users.
In hieroglyphs and with Egyptesque emojies and memes.
The power to sneeze 3 times in a row.
The power to teleport anywhere where it is impossible to wear. Strangely this superpower cannot transport space suits.
The power to fart as I wish
The power to go blind when I am about to get hit by a bus.
The power to make the driver go blind when I am about to be hit by a bus
